title: News24.com | Lockdown: Some Alexandra residents ready to defy quarantine orders if they test positive
description: Some residents of Setjwetla informal settlement in Alexandra, Johannesburg are seemingly ready to disobey the government's efforts to tackle the Covid-19 pandemic from spreading in the area.
content:
Some residents of Setjwetla informal settlement in Alexandra, Johannesburg are seemingly ready to disobey the government's efforts to tackle the Covid-19 pandemic from spreading in the area.
